verses.verse: ALEPH. Blessed<WH835> are the undefiled<WH8549> in the way<WH1870>, who walk<WH1980> in the law<WH8451> of the LORD<WH3068>. undefiled: or, perfect, or, sincere
Blessed<WH835> are they that keep<WH5341> his testimonies<WH5713>, and that seek<WH1875> him with the whole heart<WH3820>.
They also do<WH6466> no iniquity<WH5766>: they walk<WH1980> in his ways<WH1870>.
Thou hast commanded<WH6680> us to keep<WH8104> thy precepts<WH6490> diligently<WH3966>.
O that<WH305> my ways<WH1870> were directed<WH3559> to keep<WH8104> thy statutes<WH2706>!
Then shall I not be ashamed<WH954>, when I have respect<WH5027> unto all thy commandments<WH4687>.
I will praise<WH3034> thee with uprightness<WH3476> of heart<WH3824>, when I shall have learned<WH3925> thy righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>. thy: Heb. judgments of thy righteousness
I will keep<WH8104> thy statutes<WH2706>: O forsake<WH5800> me not utterly<WH3966>.
BETH. Wherewithal shall a young man<WH5288> cleanse<WH2135> his way<WH734>? by taking heed<WH8104> thereto according to thy word<WH1697>.
With my whole heart<WH3820> have I sought<WH1875> thee: O let me not wander<WH7686> from thy commandments<WH4687>.
Thy word<WH565> have I hid<WH6845> in mine heart<WH3820>, that I might not sin<WH2398> against thee.
Blessed<WH1288> art thou, O LORD<WH3068>: teach<WH3925> me thy statutes<WH2706>.
With my lips<WH8193> have I declared<WH5608> all the judgments<WH4941> of thy mouth<WH6310>.
I have rejoiced<WH7797> in the way<WH1870> of thy testimonies<WH5715>, as much as in<WH5921> all riches<WH1952>.
I will meditate<WH7878> in thy precepts<WH6490>, and have respect<WH5027> unto thy ways<WH734>.
I will delight<WH8173> myself in thy statutes<WH2708>: I will not forget<WH7911> thy word<WH1697>.
GIMEL. Deal bountifully<WH1580> with thy servant<WH5650>, that I may live<WH2421>, and keep<WH8104> thy word<WH1697>.
Open<WH1540> thou mine eyes<WH5869>, that I may behold<WH5027> wondrous things<WH6381> out of thy law<WH8451>. Open: Heb. Reveal
I am a stranger<WH1616> in the earth<WH776>: hide<WH5641> not thy commandments<WH4687> from me.
My soul<WH5315> breaketh<WH1638> for the longing<WH8375> that it hath unto thy judgments<WH4941> at all times<WH6256>.
Thou hast rebuked<WH1605> the proud<WH2086> that are cursed<WH779>, which do err<WH7686> from thy commandments<WH4687>.
Remove<WH1556> from me reproach<WH2781> and contempt<WH937>; for I have kept<WH5341> thy testimonies<WH5713>.
Princes<WH8269> also did sit<WH3427> and speak<WH1696> against me: but thy servant<WH5650> did meditate<WH7878> in thy statutes<WH2706>.
Thy testimonies<WH5713> also are my delight<WH8191> and my counsellors<WH582> <WH6098>. my counsellors: Heb. men of my counsel
DALETH. My soul<WH5315> cleaveth<WH1692> unto the dust<WH6083>: quicken<WH2421> thou me according to thy word<WH1697>.
I have declared<WH5608> my ways<WH1870>, and thou heardest<WH6030> me: teach<WH3925> me thy statutes<WH2706>.
Make me to understand<WH995> the way<WH1870> of thy precepts<WH6490>: so shall I talk<WH7878> of thy wondrous works<WH6381>.
My soul<WH5315> melteth<WH1811> for heaviness<WH8424>: strengthen<WH6965> thou me according unto thy word<WH1697>. melteth: Heb. droppeth
Remove<WH5493> from me the way<WH1870> of lying<WH8267>: and grant me thy law<WH8451> graciously<WH2603>.
I have chosen<WH977> the way<WH1870> of truth<WH530>: thy judgments<WH4941> have I laid<WH7737> before me.
I have stuck<WH1692> unto thy testimonies<WH5715>: O LORD<WH3068>, put me not to shame<WH954>.
I will run<WH7323> the way<WH1870> of thy commandments<WH4687>, when thou shalt enlarge<WH7337> my heart<WH3820>.
HE. Teach<WH3384> me, O LORD<WH3068>, the way<WH1870> of thy statutes<WH2706>; and I shall keep<WH5341> it unto the end<WH6118>.
Give me understanding<WH995>, and I shall keep<WH5341> thy law<WH8451>; yea, I shall observe<WH8104> it with my whole heart<WH3820>.
Make me to go<WH1869> in the path<WH5410> of thy commandments<WH4687>; for therein do I delight<WH2654>.
Incline<WH5186> my heart<WH3820> unto thy testimonies<WH5715>, and not to covetousness<WH1215>.
Turn away<WH5674> mine eyes<WH5869> from beholding<WH7200> vanity<WH7723>; and quicken<WH2421> thou me in thy way<WH1870>. Turn: Heb. Make to pass
Stablish<WH6965> thy word<WH565> unto thy servant<WH5650>, who is devoted to thy fear<WH3374>.
Turn away<WH5674> my reproach<WH2781> which I fear<WH3025>: for thy judgments<WH4941> are good<WH2896>.
Behold, I have longed<WH8373> after thy precepts<WH6490>: quicken<WH2421> me in thy righteousness<WH6666>.
VAU. Let thy mercies<WH2617> come<WH935> also unto me, O LORD<WH3068>, even thy salvation<WH8668>, according to thy word<WH565>.
So shall I have wherewith<WH1697> to answer<WH6030> him that reproacheth<WH2778> me: for I trust<WH982> in thy word<WH1697>. So: or, So shall I answer him that reproveth me in a thing
And take<WH5337> not the word<WH1697> of truth<WH571> utterly<WH3966> out of my mouth<WH6310>; for I have hoped<WH3176> in thy judgments<WH4941>.
So shall I keep<WH8104> thy law<WH8451> continually<WH8548> for ever<WH5769> and ever<WH5703>.
And I will walk<WH1980> at liberty<WH7342>: for I seek<WH1875> thy precepts<WH6490>. at liberty: Heb. at large
I will speak<WH1696> of thy testimonies<WH5713> also before kings<WH4428>, and will not be ashamed<WH954>.
And I will delight<WH8173> myself in thy commandments<WH4687>, which I have loved<WH157>.
My hands<WH3709> also will I lift up<WH5375> unto thy commandments<WH4687>, which I have loved<WH157>; and I will meditate<WH7878> in thy statutes<WH2706>.
ZAIN. Remember<WH2142> the word<WH1697> unto thy servant<WH5650>, upon which thou hast caused me to hope<WH3176>.
This is my comfort<WH5165> in my affliction<WH6040>: for thy word<WH565> hath quickened<WH2421> me.
The proud<WH2086> have had me greatly<WH3966> in derision<WH3887>: yet have I not declined<WH5186> from thy law<WH8451>.
I remembered<WH2142> thy judgments<WH4941> of old<WH5769>, O LORD<WH3068>; and have comforted<WH5162> myself.
Horror<WH2152> hath taken hold<WH270> upon me because of the wicked<WH7563> that forsake<WH5800> thy law<WH8451>.
Thy statutes<WH2706> have been my songs<WH2158> in the house<WH1004> of my pilgrimage<WH4033>.
I have remembered<WH2142> thy name<WH8034>, O LORD<WH3068>, in the night<WH3915>, and have kept<WH8104> thy law<WH8451>.
This I had, because I kept<WH5341> thy precepts<WH6490>.
CHETH. Thou art my portion<WH2506>, O LORD<WH3068>: I have said<WH559> that I would keep<WH8104> thy words<WH1697>.
I intreated<WH2470> thy favour<WH6440> with my whole heart<WH3820>: be merciful<WH2603> unto me according to thy word<WH565>. favour: Heb. face
I thought<WH2803> on my ways<WH1870>, and turned<WH7725> my feet<WH7272> unto thy testimonies<WH5713>.
I made haste<WH2363>, and delayed<WH4102> not to keep<WH8104> thy commandments<WH4687>.
The bands<WH2256> of the wicked<WH7563> have robbed<WH5749> me: but I have not forgotten<WH7911> thy law<WH8451>. bands: or, companies
At midnight<WH2676> <WH3915> I will rise<WH6965> to give thanks<WH3034> unto thee because of thy righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>.
I am a companion<WH2270> of all them that fear<WH3372> thee, and of them that keep<WH8104> thy precepts<WH6490>.
The earth<WH776>, O LORD<WH3068>, is full<WH4390> of thy mercy<WH2617>: teach<WH3925> me thy statutes<WH2706>.
TETH. Thou hast dealt<WH6213> well<WH2896> with thy servant<WH5650>, O LORD<WH3068>, according unto thy word<WH1697>.
Teach<WH3925> me good<WH2898> judgment<WH2940> and knowledge<WH1847>: for I have believed<WH539> thy commandments<WH4687>.
Before I was afflicted<WH6031> I went astray<WH7683>: but now have I kept<WH8104> thy word<WH565>.
Thou art good<WH2896>, and doest good<WH2895>; teach<WH3925> me thy statutes<WH2706>.
The proud<WH2086> have forged<WH2950> a lie<WH8267> against me: but I will keep<WH5341> thy precepts<WH6490> with my whole heart<WH3820>.
Their heart<WH3820> is as fat<WH2954> as grease<WH2459>; but I delight<WH8173> in thy law<WH8451>.
It is good<WH2896> for me that I have been afflicted<WH6031>; that I might learn<WH3925> thy statutes<WH2706>.
The law<WH8451> of thy mouth<WH6310> is better<WH2896> unto me than thousands<WH505> of gold<WH2091> and silver<WH3701>.
JOD. Thy hands<WH3027> have made<WH6213> me and fashioned<WH3559> me: give me understanding<WH995>, that I may learn<WH3925> thy commandments<WH4687>.
They that fear<WH3373> thee will be glad<WH8055> when they see<WH7200> me; because I have hoped<WH3176> in thy word<WH1697>.
I know<WH3045>, O LORD<WH3068>, that thy judgments<WH4941> are right<WH6664>, and that thou in faithfulness<WH530> hast afflicted<WH6031> me. right: Heb. righteousness
Let, I pray thee, thy merciful kindness<WH2617> be for my comfort<WH5162>, according to thy word<WH565> unto thy servant<WH5650>. for: Heb. to comfort me
Let thy tender mercies<WH7356> come<WH935> unto me, that I may live<WH2421>: for thy law<WH8451> is my delight<WH8191>.
Let the proud<WH2086> be ashamed<WH954>; for they dealt perversely<WH5791> with me without a cause<WH8267>: but I will meditate<WH7878> in thy precepts<WH6490>.
Let those that fear<WH3373> thee turn<WH7725> unto me, and those that have known<WH3045> <WH3045> thy testimonies<WH5713>.
Let my heart<WH3820> be sound<WH8549> in thy statutes<WH2706>; that I be not ashamed<WH954>.
CAPH. My soul<WH5315> fainteth<WH3615> for thy salvation<WH8668>: but I hope<WH3176> in thy word<WH1697>.
Mine eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> for thy word<WH565>, saying<WH559>, When wilt thou comfort<WH5162> me?
For I am become like a bottle<WH4997> in the smoke<WH7008>; yet do I not forget<WH7911> thy statutes<WH2706>.
How many are the days<WH3117> of thy servant<WH5650>? when wilt thou execute<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> on them that persecute<WH7291> me?
The proud<WH2086> have digged<WH3738> pits<WH7882> for me, which are not after thy law<WH8451>.
All thy commandments<WH4687> are faithful<WH530>: they persecute<WH7291> me wrongfully<WH8267>; help<WH5826> thou me. faithful: Heb. faithfulness
They had almost<WH4592> consumed<WH3615> me upon earth<WH776>; but I forsook<WH5800> not thy precepts<WH6490>.
Quicken<WH2421> me after thy lovingkindness<WH2617>; so shall I keep<WH8104> the testimony<WH5715> of thy mouth<WH6310>.
LAMED. For ever<WH5769>, O LORD<WH3068>, thy word<WH1697> is settled<WH5324> in heaven<WH8064>.
Thy faithfulness<WH530> is unto all<WH1755> generations<WH1755>: thou hast established<WH3559> the earth<WH776>, and it abideth<WH5975>. unto: Heb. to generation and generation abideth: Heb. standeth
They continue<WH5975> this day<WH3117> according to thine ordinances<WH4941>: for all are thy servants<WH5650>.
Unless<WH3884> thy law<WH8451> had been my delights<WH8191>, I should then have perished<WH6> in mine affliction<WH6040>.
I will never<WH5769> forget<WH7911> thy precepts<WH6490>: for with them thou hast quickened<WH2421> me.
I am thine, save<WH3467> me; for I have sought<WH1875> thy precepts<WH6490>.
The wicked<WH7563> have waited<WH6960> for me to destroy<WH6> me: but I will consider<WH995> thy testimonies<WH5713>.
I have seen<WH7200> an end<WH7093> of all perfection<WH8502>: but thy commandment<WH4687> is exceeding<WH3966> broad<WH7342>.
MEM. O how love I<WH157> thy law<WH8451>! it is my meditation<WH7881> all the day<WH3117>.
Thou through thy commandments<WH4687> hast made me wiser<WH2449> than mine enemies<WH341>: for they are ever<WH5769> with me. they: Heb. it is ever with me
I have more understanding<WH7919> than all my teachers<WH3925>: for thy testimonies<WH5715> are my meditation<WH7881>.
I understand<WH995> more than the ancients<WH2205>, because I keep<WH5341> thy precepts<WH6490>.
I have refrained<WH3607> my feet<WH7272> from every evil<WH7451> way<WH734>, that I might keep<WH8104> thy word<WH1697>.
I have not departed<WH5493> from thy judgments<WH4941>: for thou hast taught<WH3384> me.
How sweet<WH4452> are thy words<WH565> unto my taste<WH2441>! yea, sweeter than honey<WH1706> to my mouth<WH6310>! taste: Heb. palate
Through thy precepts<WH6490> I get understanding<WH995>: therefore I hate<WH8130> every false<WH8267> way<WH734>.
NUN. Thy word<WH1697> is a lamp<WH5216> unto my feet<WH7272>, and a light<WH216> unto my path<WH5410>. lamp: or, candle
I have sworn<WH7650>, and I will perform<WH6965> it, that I will keep<WH8104> thy righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>.
I am afflicted<WH6031> very much<WH3966>: quicken<WH2421> me, O LORD<WH3068>, according unto thy word<WH1697>.
Accept<WH7521>, I beseech thee, the freewill offerings<WH5071> of my mouth<WH6310>, O LORD<WH3068>, and teach<WH3925> me thy judgments<WH4941>.
My soul<WH5315> is continually<WH8548> in my hand<WH3709>: yet do I not forget<WH7911> thy law<WH8451>.
The wicked<WH7563> have laid<WH5414> a snare<WH6341> for me: yet I erred<WH8582> not from thy precepts<WH6490>.
Thy testimonies<WH5715> have I taken as an heritage<WH5157> for ever<WH5769>: for they are the rejoicing<WH8342> of my heart<WH3820>.
I have inclined<WH5186> mine heart<WH3820> to perform<WH6213> thy statutes<WH2706> alway<WH5769>, even unto the end<WH6118>. to perform: Heb. to do
SAMECH. I hate<WH8130> vain thoughts<WH5588>: but thy law<WH8451> do I love<WH157>.
Thou art my hiding place<WH5643> and my shield<WH4043>: I hope<WH3176> in thy word<WH1697>.
Depart<WH5493> from me, ye evildoers<WH7489>: for I will keep<WH5341> the commandments<WH4687> of my God<WH430>.
Uphold<WH5564> me according unto thy word<WH565>, that I may live<WH2421>: and let me not be ashamed<WH954> of my hope<WH7664>.
Hold thou me up<WH5582>, and I shall be safe<WH3467>: and I will have respect<WH8159> unto thy statutes<WH2706> continually<WH8548>.
Thou hast trodden down<WH5541> all them that err<WH7686> from thy statutes<WH2706>: for their deceit<WH8649> is falsehood<WH8267>.
Thou puttest away<WH7673> all the wicked<WH7563> of the earth<WH776> like dross<WH5509>: therefore I love<WH157> thy testimonies<WH5713>. puttest: Heb. causest to cease
My flesh<WH1320> trembleth<WH5568> for fear<WH6343> of thee; and I am afraid<WH3372> of thy judgments<WH4941>.
AIN. I have done<WH6213> judgment<WH4941> and justice<WH6664>: leave<WH3240> me not to mine oppressors<WH6231>.
Be surety<WH6148> for thy servant<WH5650> for good<WH2896>: let not the proud<WH2086> oppress<WH6231> me.
Mine eyes<WH5869> fail<WH3615> for thy salvation<WH3444>, and for the word<WH565> of thy righteousness<WH6664>.
Deal<WH6213> with thy servant<WH5650> according unto thy mercy<WH2617>, and teach<WH3925> me thy statutes<WH2706>.
I am thy servant<WH5650>; give me understanding<WH995>, that I may know<WH3045> thy testimonies<WH5713>.
It is time<WH6256> for thee, LORD<WH3068>, to work<WH6213>: for they have made void<WH6565> thy law<WH8451>.
Therefore I love<WH157> thy commandments<WH4687> above gold<WH2091>; yea, above fine gold<WH6337>.
Therefore I esteem all thy precepts<WH6490> concerning all things to be right<WH3474>; and I hate<WH8130> every false<WH8267> way<WH734>.
PE. Thy testimonies<WH5715> are wonderful<WH6382>: therefore doth my soul<WH5315> keep<WH5341> them.
The entrance<WH6608> of thy words<WH1697> giveth light<WH215>; it giveth understanding<WH995> unto the simple<WH6612>.
I opened<WH6473> my mouth<WH6310>, and panted<WH7602>: for I longed<WH2968> for thy commandments<WH4687>.
Look<WH6437> thou upon me, and be merciful<WH2603> unto me, as thou usest<WH4941> to do unto those that love<WH157> thy name<WH8034>. as thou: Heb. according to the custom toward those, etc
Order<WH3559> my steps<WH6471> in thy word<WH565>: and let not any iniquity<WH205> have dominion<WH7980> over me.
Deliver<WH6299> me from the oppression<WH6233> of man<WH120>: so will I keep<WH8104> thy precepts<WH6490>.
Make thy face<WH6440> to shine<WH215> upon thy servant<WH5650>; and teach<WH3925> me thy statutes<WH2706>.
Rivers<WH6388> of waters<WH4325> run down<WH3381> mine eyes<WH5869>, because they keep<WH8104> not thy law<WH8451>.
TZADDI. Righteous<WH6662> art thou, O LORD<WH3068>, and upright<WH3477> are thy judgments<WH4941>.
Thy testimonies<WH5713> that thou hast commanded<WH6680> are righteous<WH6664> and very<WH3966> faithful<WH530>. righteous: Heb. righteousness faithful: Heb. faithfulness
My zeal<WH7068> hath consumed<WH6789> me, because mine enemies<WH6862> have forgotten<WH7911> thy words<WH1697>. consumed: Heb. cut me off
Thy word<WH565> is very<WH3966> pure<WH6884>: therefore thy servant<WH5650> loveth<WH157> it. pure: Heb. tried, or, refined
I am small<WH6810> and despised<WH959>: yet do not I forget<WH7911> thy precepts<WH6490>.
Thy righteousness<WH6666> is an everlasting<WH5769> righteousness<WH6664>, and thy law<WH8451> is the truth<WH571>.
Trouble<WH6862> and anguish<WH4689> have taken hold<WH4672> on me: yet thy commandments<WH4687> are my delights<WH8191>. taken: Heb. found me
The righteousness<WH6664> of thy testimonies<WH5715> is everlasting<WH5769>: give me understanding<WH995>, and I shall live<WH2421>.
KOPH. I cried<WH7121> with my whole heart<WH3820>; hear<WH6030> me, O LORD<WH3068>: I will keep<WH5341> thy statutes<WH2706>.
I cried<WH7121> unto thee; save<WH3467> me, and I shall keep<WH8104> thy testimonies<WH5713>. and I: or, that I may keep
I prevented<WH6923> the dawning of the morning<WH5399>, and cried<WH7768>: I hoped<WH3176> in thy word<WH1697>.
Mine eyes<WH5869> prevent<WH6923> the night watches<WH821>, that I might meditate<WH7878> in thy word<WH565>.
Hear<WH8085> my voice<WH6963> according unto thy lovingkindness<WH2617>: O LORD<WH3068>, quicken<WH2421> me according to thy judgment<WH4941>.
They draw nigh<WH7126> that follow<WH7291> after mischief<WH2154>: they are far<WH7368> from thy law<WH8451>.
Thou art near<WH7138>, O LORD<WH3068>; and all thy commandments<WH4687> are truth<WH571>.
Concerning thy testimonies<WH5713>, I have known<WH3045> of old<WH6924> that thou hast founded<WH3245> them for ever<WH5769>.
RESH. Consider<WH7200> mine affliction<WH6040>, and deliver<WH2502> me: for I do not forget<WH7911> thy law<WH8451>.
Plead<WH7378> my cause<WH7379>, and deliver<WH1350> me: quicken<WH2421> me according to thy word<WH565>.
Salvation<WH3444> is far<WH7350> from the wicked<WH7563>: for they seek<WH1875> not thy statutes<WH2706>.
Great<WH7227> are thy tender mercies<WH7356>, O LORD<WH3068>: quicken<WH2421> me according to thy judgments<WH4941>. Great: or, Many
Many<WH7227> are my persecutors<WH7291> and mine enemies<WH6862>; yet do I not decline<WH5186> from thy testimonies<WH5715>.
I beheld<WH7200> the transgressors<WH898>, and was grieved<WH6962>; because they kept<WH8104> not thy word<WH565>.
Consider<WH7200> how I love<WH157> thy precepts<WH6490>: quicken<WH2421> me, O LORD<WH3068>, according to thy lovingkindness<WH2617>.
Thy word<WH1697> is true<WH571> from the beginning<WH7218>: and every one of thy righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941> endureth for ever<WH5769>. Thy word: Heb. The beginning of thy word is true
SCHIN. Princes<WH8269> have persecuted<WH7291> me without a cause<WH2600>: but my heart<WH3820> standeth in awe<WH6342> of thy word<WH1697>.
I rejoice<WH7797> at thy word<WH565>, as one that findeth<WH4672> great<WH7227> spoil<WH7998>.
I hate<WH8130> and abhor<WH8581> lying<WH8267>: but thy law<WH8451> do I love<WH157>.
Seven times<WH7651> a day<WH3117> do I praise<WH1984> thee because of thy righteous<WH6664> judgments<WH4941>.
Great<WH7227> peace<WH7965> have they which love<WH157> thy law<WH8451>: and nothing shall offend<WH4383> them. nothing: Heb. they shall have no stumblingblock
LORD<WH3068>, I have hoped<WH7663> for thy salvation<WH3444>, and done<WH6213> thy commandments<WH4687>.
My soul<WH5315> hath kept<WH8104> thy testimonies<WH5713>; and I love<WH157> them exceedingly<WH3966>.
I have kept<WH8104> thy precepts<WH6490> and thy testimonies<WH5713>: for all my ways<WH1870> are before thee.
TAU. Let my cry<WH7440> come near<WH7126> before<WH6440> thee, O LORD<WH3068>: give me understanding<WH995> according to thy word<WH1697>.
Let my supplication<WH8467> come<WH935> before<WH6440> thee: deliver<WH5337> me according to thy word<WH565>.
My lips<WH8193> shall utter<WH5042> praise<WH8416>, when thou hast taught<WH3925> me thy statutes<WH2706>.
My tongue<WH3956> shall speak<WH6030> of thy word<WH565>: for all thy commandments<WH4687> are righteousness<WH6664>.
Let thine hand<WH3027> help<WH5826> me; for I have chosen<WH977> thy precepts<WH6490>.
I have longed<WH8373> for thy salvation<WH3444>, O LORD<WH3068>; and thy law<WH8451> is my delight<WH8191>.
Let my soul<WH5315> live<WH2421>, and it shall praise<WH1984> thee; and let thy judgments<WH4941> help<WH5826> me.
I have gone astray<WH8582> like a lost<WH6> sheep<WH7716>; seek<WH1245> thy servant<WH5650>; for I do not forget<WH7911> thy commandments<WH4687>.
